{ "_id": "5a32baae39f785000dce62a9", "created": "2017-12-14T17:53:50.868Z", "lastModified": "2022-10-01T04:31:37.105Z", "style": "PAT029Y", "title": "Micro Puff Hooded Insulated Jacket - Men's", "listDescription": "", "detailDescription": "

Before anything else, we slide the Patagonia Micro Puff Hooded Insulated Jacket over our baselayer at the snowshoeing trailhead. So when the storm clouds roll in and snow starts to dump, we can just zip up a waterproof shell over it and comfortably watch the world turn snowy white.

", "bottomLine": "Why We Like The Micro Puff Hooded Insulated Jacket", "sizingChartId": 11, "writer": "bbaisley", "editor": "bbaisley", "status": "Published", "competitiveCyclistDescription": "", "competitiveCyclistBottomLine": "", "productGroupId": 100000115, "brandId": 54, "__v": 20, "keywords": [ "mountaineering outerwear", " technical jackets", " insulated jackets", " alpine jackets", " patagonia micro puff jacket" ], "bulletPoints": [ "Warm, windproof jacket for chilly climbing or backcountry days", "Water-repellent Pertex Quantum sheds light precipitation", "PlumaFill insulation mimics down for lightweight warmth", "Regular fit offers room for baselayers", "Elasticized cuffs and hem seal in warmth", "Multiple pockets stash snacks, maps, and your phone" ], "skuCopy": [] }
